TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StackTrace extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StackTrace extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StackTrace extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个堆栈跟踪，它是一个或多个堆栈帧的有序集合。

span.span: Represents a stack trace, which is an ordered collection of one or more stack frames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关调试生成配置的信息将非常丰富。 information will be most informative with Debug build configurations. 默认情况下，调试版本包含调试符号，而发布版本则不包含。By default, Debug builds include debug symbols, while Release builds do not. 调试符号包含构造和对象中使用的大多数文件、方法名称、行号和列信息 。The debug symbols contain most of the file, method name, line number, and column information used in constructing and objects. 由于优化期间发生的代码转换，可能不会按预期方式报告任意数量的方法调用。 might not report as many method calls as expected, due to code transformations that occur during optimization. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示如何创建一个简单的 循环访问其帧以获取调试和诊断信息。The following console application demonstrates how to create a simple and iterate through its frames to obtain debugging and diagnostic information. [!code-cpp[StackTraceSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample1/CPP/stacktracesample1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StackTraceSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample1/CS/stacktracesample1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StackTraceSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample1/VB/stacktracesample1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 用调用方的帧初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the caller's frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用调用方的当前线程创建的，并且不包含文件名、行号或列信息。The is created with the caller's current thread, and does not contain file name, line number, or column information. 如果需要包含有关调用堆栈的摘要方法信息的完整跟踪，请使用此无参数的构造函数。Use this parameterless constructor when you want a complete trace with only summary method information about the call stack. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示堆栈跟踪中的第一个和最后一个函数调用。The following code example displays the first and last function calls in a stack trace. [!code-cpp[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CPP/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/VB/source.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用调用方的当前线程创建的。The is created with the caller's current thread. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了各种 构造函数方法。The following code example demonstrates various constructor methods. [!code-cpp[StackFrameSample1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 初始化包含单个帧的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains a single frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不想要执行完整堆栈跟踪的开销，请使用此构造函数。Use this constructor when you do not want the overhead of a full stack trace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将堆栈跟踪信息写入事件日志项。The following code example writes stack trace information to an event log entry. [!code-cpp[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/CPP/stacktracesample3.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/CS/stacktracesample3.cs#6)] [!code-vb[StackTraceSample3#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample3/VB/stacktracesample3.vb#6)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided exception object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用调用方的当前线程创建的，并且不包含文件名、行号或列信息。The is created with the caller's current thread, and does not contain file name, line number, or column information. 生成的堆栈跟踪说明了在发生异常时的堆栈。The resulting stack trace describes the stack at the time of the exception.

span.span: The parameter is .

param.span: 堆栈中的帧数，将从其上开始跟踪。

span.span: The number of frames up the stack from which to start the trace.

summary.span: 从调用方的帧初始化 类的新实例，跳过指定的帧数。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the caller's frame, skipping the specified number of frames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用调用方的当前线程创建的，并且不包含文件名、行号或列信息。The is created with the caller's current thread, and does not contain file name, line number, or column information. 如果要跳过的帧数大于或等于创建实例时调用堆栈上的总帧数，则 将不包含帧。If the number of frames to skip is greater than or equal to the total number of frames on the call stack at the time the instance is created, the will contain no frames.

span.span: The parameter is negative.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constructor has been deprecated. Please use a constructor that does not require a Thread parameter. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")]
[<System.Obsolete("This constructor has been deprecated. Please use a constructor that does not require a Thread parameter. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

param.name: targetThread
param.span: 请求其堆栈跟踪的线程。

span.span: The thread whose stack trace is requested.

param.name: needFileInfo
param.span: 如果为 ，则捕获文件名、行号和列号；否则为 。

span.span: to capture the file name, line number, and column number; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化特定线程的 类的新实例，可以选择捕获源信息。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specific thread, optionally capturing source information.

summary.span: 不要使用此构造函数重载。

span.span: Do not use this constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用此构造函数。Do not use this constructor. 它已过时，并且没有推荐的替代项。It is obsolete, and there is no recommended alternative. 在挂起线程时，你无法获知它正在执行的代码，并且很容易发生死锁。When you suspend a thread, you have no way of knowing what code it is executing, and deadlocks can occur very easily. 例如，如果在安全权限评估期间，您在线程保持锁定的情况下将其挂起，则 中的其他线程可能被阻止。For example, if you suspend a thread while it holds locks during a security permission evaluation, other threads in the might be blocked. 如果在线程执行类构造函数时挂起该线程，则中的其他线程将 会阻止尝试使用该类。If you suspend a thread while it is executing a class constructor, other threads in the that attempt to use that class are blocked.

span.span: The thread is not suspended.

Gets the specified stack frame.
The specified stack frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 堆栈帧从0开始编号，这是推送的最后一个堆栈帧。Stack frames are numbered starting at 0, which is the last stack frame pushed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示堆栈跟踪中的第一个和最后一个函数调用。The following code example displays the first and last function calls in a stack trace. [!code-cpp[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CPP/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[StackFrameSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackFrameSample1/VB/source.vb#8)]

summary.span: 返回当前堆栈跟踪中所有堆栈帧的副本。

span.span: Returns a copy of all stack frames in the current stack trace.

returns.span: 类型的数组，表示堆栈跟踪中的函数调用。

span.span: An array of type representing the function calls in the stack trace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用返回的 数组枚举和检查中的函数调用 。Use the returned array to enumerate and examine function calls in the . 返回数组的长度等于 属性值。The length of the returned array is equal to the property value. 数组元素按时间顺序反转。The array elements are in reverse chronological order. 位于数组索引0处的表示堆栈跟踪中最近的函数调用，以及推送到调用堆栈上的最后一个帧。The at array index 0 represents the most recent function call in the stack trace and the last frame pushed onto the call stack. In 数组索引 减1表示堆栈跟踪中最早的函数调用，以及推送到调用堆栈上的第一个帧。The at array index minus 1 represents the oldest function call in the stack trace and the first frame pushed onto the call stack. 使用 方法获取堆栈跟踪中的所有堆栈帧; 使用 方法获取堆栈跟踪中的特定堆栈帧。Use the method to obtain all stack frames in a stack trace; use the method to obtain a specific stack frame in a stack trace. 索引按两种方法排序。The indexes are ordered alike by the two methods. 例如，返回的 数组中位于索引0处的 等效于返回的，其 输入索引为0。For example, the at index 0 in the array returned by is equivalent to the returned by with an input index of 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何枚举中的帧 。The following code example demonstrates enumerating the frames in a . [!code-cpp[StackTraceSample2#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample2/CPP/stacktracesample2.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[StackTraceSample2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample2/CS/stacktracesample2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StackTraceSample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StackTraceSample2/VB/stacktracesample2.vb#3)]

summary.span: 定义要从堆栈跟踪中省略的默认方法数。

span.span: Defines the default for the number of methods to omit from the stack trace.
This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要在堆栈跟踪开始时跳过的方法数的默认值。The default value for the number of methods to skip at the beginning of the stack trace. 此常量的值为0。The value of this constant is 0.
